Description: The conditional expression  "parameter.Year < 2014 || parameter.Year > DateTime.Now.Year + 1 || parameter.Month < 1 || parameter.Month > 12"  is complex.
The following statement contains a magic number: parameter.Year = parameter.YearMonth / 100;
The following statement contains a magic number: parameter.Month = parameter.YearMonth % 100;

The following statement contains a magic number: if (parameter.Year < 2014 || parameter.Year > DateTime.Now.Year + 1 || parameter.Month < 1 || parameter.Month > 12) {  	throw new Exception ("错误的年月格式");  }

The following statement contains a magic number: if (parameter.Year < 2014 || parameter.Year > DateTime.Now.Year + 1 || parameter.Month < 1 || parameter.Month > 12) {  	throw new Exception ("错误的年月格式");  }

The following statement contains a magic number: if (HttpContext.Current != null) {  	var httpException = exception as HttpException;  	if (httpException != null && httpException.ErrorCode == 404) {  		Server.ClearError ();  		return;  	}  }
The following statement contains a magic number: if (httpException != null && httpException.ErrorCode == 404) {  	Server.ClearError ();  	return;  }
